content: reunion capelet pattern design by carryl mccarthy reunion capelet pattern designed by carryl mccarthy yarn bulky 215 yards pictured is loops & threads charisma yarn in color ash needles size 13 us / 9 mm gauge 11 sts x 16 row = 4 x 4 inches 10 x 10 cm notions 2 buttons 1 ½ darning needle scissors abbreviations ssk slip a stitch as if to knit it to the right-hand needle slip a second stitch in the same way slip both stitches together back to the left-hand needle and knit together through the back loops k2tog knit 2 stitches together sl1p slip one stitch purlwise with the yarn in front yo twice bring yarn forward wrap the yarn around the needle and bring the yarn forward a second time proceed to knit the next stitch results in 2 yarn-over stitches on the following row k1 p1 into the yarn-over stitches wrap & turn keeping yarn in back slip the next stitch purlwise from the left needle to the right needle bring the yarn forward as if to purl slip the stitch from the right needle back to the left needle turn the work so the yarn so the other side of the work is facing you and knit the next row details pattern is worked in garter stitch so knit every row to make a nice finished edge slip the first stitch purlwise with the yarn in front move yarn to back and knit the last stitch since the short row are done in garter stitch it is not necessary to pick up the wraps at the end of each section just knit all stitches on the needle capelet can be adjusted easily by adding/removing pattern repeats pattern cast on 32 sts using long tail cast on method knit 3 row slip 1 k31 begin short row pattern row 1 rs sl1p k19 wrap and turn row 2 ws k20 row 3 sl1p k15 wrap and turn row 4 k16 row 5 sl1p k11 wrap and turn row 6 k12 row 7 sl1p k7 wrap and turn row 8 k8 row 9 sl1p k3 wrap and turn row 10 k4 row 11 18 sl1p k31 repeat row 1-18 a total of 10* rounds * i recommend that after 9 rounds you check the capelet for length and adjust repeats as needed depending on the stretch of your yarn your neck size and how you prefer to wear the capelet you may want to add or remove repeats to make it fit once buttoned button hole rounds row 1 rs sl1p k19 wrap and turn row 2
